articles.title: Shakira accused of tax crimes for the second time - BBC
articles.description: Spanish prosecutors claim the singer has defrauded the state of more than €6m.
articles.content:
Colombian pop star Shakira has been charged with tax evasion for the second time by the Spanish government.
Prosecutors in Spain allege the singer defrauded the state of 6.7m ($7.1m, £5.8m) in 2018.… [+1344 chars]

articles.title: '8 Mile' actor and rapper Nashawn 'OX' Breedlove' has reportedly died - NME

articles.content:
The rapper and 8 Mile actor Nashawn Breedlove has reportedly died.
